titles: [The] Judgment of the reformed churches that a man may lawfully not only put away his vvife for her adultery, but also marry another.
publisher: printed for Andrew Crook at the Green Dragon in Pauls Churchyard,
notes: Caption and running titles read: Of the lawfulness of marriage upon a lawful divorce.
Reproduction of the original in the Lampeter, St. David's University College, University Library.
Dummmy Imperfect. Copy catalogued is torn at head, affecting text.
